meta.title: SnapMedia - Cross-platform Media Downloader | Supports YouTube, TikTok, Instagram and 15+ Platforms
meta.description: SnapMedia is a free cross-platform media downloader that supports YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Twitter, Bilibili and 15+ popular platforms for video and audio downloads. Fast, secure, watermark-free.
meta.keywords: video downloader,audio downloader,YouTube downloader,TikTok downloader,Instagram downloader,Twitter downloader,Bilibili downloader,cross-platform downloader,free downloader,watermark-free downloader

header.title: Cross-platform Media Downloader
header.subtitle: Get your favorite content with one click

settings.title: Settings
settings.processingDescription:
üéØ **Smart Selection**: YouTube, Bilibili use browser merge, other platforms use server merge
üîß **Browser Merge**: All platforms merge video and audio in browser (fast, uses memory)
üåê **Server Merge**: All platforms merge on server (saves memory, may be slower)
‚ö° **Hybrid Mode**: Intelligently choose processing method based on file type
settings.proxyDescription:
üí° **Proxy Settings Explanation:**
‚Ä¢ üöÄ **Direct Mode** (default): Download directly from source, fastest speed
‚Ä¢ üõ°Ô∏è **Proxy Mode**: Transfer through server, can bypass anti-hotlinking and regional restrictions, but slower
‚Ä¢ üìã **Use Cases**: Enable proxy when downloads fail, regional restrictions, or anti-hotlinking blocks
settings.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? This will clear all custom configurations.

preview.title: Video Preview
preview.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support video playback
preview.mergeType: YouTube video download includes two separate files:
preview.videoFile: **Video file** (no audio) - used for preview above
preview.mergeNote: You need to use video editing software to merge these two files.
preview.singleType: ‚úÖ Single media file detected, click download to save.
preview.singleNote: This is a complete media file, no additional processing needed.
preview.multipleType: üì¶ Multiple files detected, will download separately.
preview.proxyNote: SnapMedia proxy may require special handling
preview.directDownloadNote: Some platform videos need direct download
preview.clickDownloadHint: Click the button below to download directly

queue.title: Processing Queue
queue.mergeFailed: Merge failed, downloading video and audio separately...
queue.separateFilesDownloaded: Downloaded video and audio files separately

errors.rateLimited: Too many requests, please try again later
errors.timeout: Request timeout, please check network connection
errors.networkError: Network error, please try again later
errors.fetchFailed: This platform is temporarily blocked, please try again later
errors.facebookShortLink: Facebook short links are not supported, please use full Facebook links

noscript.title: SnapMedia requires JavaScript
noscript.message: Please enable JavaScript to use SnapMedia cross-platform media downloader.
